extension.name: JoomFacebookLogin!
extension.author: Stavros Zavrakas
extension.description: A simple module that allows the users to login to a Joomla! website using Facebook.

field.name: fb_is_enabled
field.label: Enable Facebook Login
field.description: Check if you want to enable facebook login for your website

field.name: fb_app_secret
field.label: Facebook App Secret
field.description: Please enter the Facebook Application Secret

field.name: fb_app_id
field.label: Facebook AppId
field.description: Please enter the Facebook Application ID

field.name: fbButtonText
field.label: Facebook Button Text
field.description: Please enter the text that you want to appear on the facebook button

field.name: google_is_enabled
field.label: Enable Google Login
field.description: Check if you want to enable google login for your website

field.name: google_app_secret
field.label: Google App Secret
field.description: Please enter the Google Application Secret

field.name: google_app_id
field.label: Google AppId
field.description: Please enter the Google Application ID

field.name: googleButtonText
field.label: Google Button Text
field.description: Please enter the text that you want to appear on the google button
